short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate form filling, extract and generate JSON data, and simplify QA testing with Form Filler

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your QA testing efficiency with Form Filler Assistant, the ultimate Chrome extension designed to revolutionize the way you interact with web forms. Tailored for developers, QA engineers, and professionals seeking to optimize their testing workflows, Form Filler Assistant offers an intelligent, user-friendly solution for managing form data.

Key Features:
Automated Form Filling: Seamlessly populate forms with data, using either JSON input directly in the extension or from an external file, saving you time and reducing manual entry errors.

Effortless Data Extraction: 
Convert form inputs into structured JSON format with a single click. Export this data to a file for easy sharing, analysis, or future use, streamlining your testing and development processes.

Dynamic DOM Interaction: 
Intuitively select input elements directly from the webpage's DOM. Generate and modify JSON templates based on actual form structures, enhancing the accuracy and relevance of your testing data.

Customizable Workflow:
 Whether you're conducting detailed QA tests, developing web forms, or managing data entry tasks, Form Filler Assistant adapts to your needs, offering flexibility and precision.

Empower your testing and development with Form Filler Assistantâ€”where convenience meets functionality. Simplify your form interactions, enhance data accuracy, and boost your productivity with just a few clicks.
